name: Trip Report: Eurowings BEST Class, A319, London Stansted - Stuttgart
description:
Follow me on Snapchat: pauls_trips ¦ https://snapchat.com/add/pauls_trips

Follow me on Twitter: @pauls_trips ¦ https://twitter.com/pauls_trips

Follow me on Instagram: paulstripreports ¦ https://www.instagram.com/paulstripreports/

Date of Travel: 05 APR 2017
Aircraft: Airbus A319
Tail: D-AGWO
Livery: Old Germanwings livery
Route: STN-STR
Weather on Departure: Clear, winds low
Weather on Arrival: Broken cloud, winds low
Airborne Time: 1h24m
Miles: 454
Remarks: First Eurowings experience!


Thanks for finding my video and pressing play! 

A new experience for me. A first time with Eurowings, with a great value BEST fare. This is basically business class in all but name, including fast track security, lounge access, a blocked middle seat and anything you want from the menu onboard. Super value at less than £90 one-way and a real competitor to full service airlines.

I definitely recommend giving Eurowings BEST a try if you're a current customer of full service airlines - this fare rivalled even many basic economy fares for this given date.

I hope you like the video - don't forget to leave a comment - I do read them all!
